name: Ball Godot
description:
What to do

Invest world and relax

Short story

He lived an ordinary simple ball. He did not harm anyone. But one day, he wakes up and feels an extraordinary force that helped him change the size of his body by inhaling and exhaling air. Changing the size, he feels something strange. It feels like something is losing and something is gaining. Now nothing will stop him!

Controls

E - grow up
Q - grow down
F - pickup / drop / interact
WASD - move
Space - jump

The big ball can move big hard objects
The medium ball can bring objects and move the fastest
The small ball can jump the highest, and also move through small areas

Warning

When you click play you can feel like the game freeze, but it loads a huge map
